name: (2022AU-1-1) SEND the HORDE
description:
SEND the HORDE

Play as a mad scientist and command your army of the undead to pillage and plunder the humans of a city that has ignored and belittled you for too long! But be careful with your resources so as to not be overrun yourself. Take over the town by destroying buildings and unleashing zombies upon their citizens, and then build your base to grow the horde.
